CRW_Irrena |guid = c0d8cf7b-1c9e-488b-bd29-c68d049105ba }} '''Irrena''' is a character and recruitable [crew member](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireCrewMembers/) in {{poe2}}. ## Background A founding member of the Defiant's crew and one of the survivors of the Deadfire welcome. Although she survived, she didn't do so unscathed: She suffered a broken knee and a nasty gouge along the length of her shin. It's the result of her trying to fasten the mess on the deck when the ship hit ground. A barrel crunched her leg. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [Helping Hands](/helpingHands/) |none = |other = |crew = {{crewrank|1|deckhand}}
{{crewrank|1|cook}}
Personality: Fearless }} ## =Quests = * [Helping Hands](/helpingHands/): Irrena can be saved during the course of the quest. ## Gallery female_human_02_sm.png | Irrena's crew portrait [Category:Vilario's Rest characters](/categoryVilariosRestCharacters/)

{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Irrena |image = Female_Human_02_Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Irrena.png |caption = |race = Human |subrace = Ocean |gender = Female |culture = [[The Vailian Republics]] |background = |faction = |deity = |personality = Roguish, Fearless |class = Rogue |level = 1 |MIG = 14 |CON = 12 |DEX = 13 |PER = 13 |INT = 13 |RES = 13 |health = 44 |damage = 17-22 {{pierce}} |accuracy = 23 |penetration = 9 |deflection = 23 |fortitude = 27 |reflex = 42 |will = 32 |dr = 3 |ability = [[Fighting Spirit (Deadfire)|Fighting Spirit]], [[Sneak Attack (Deadfire)|Sneak Attack]], [[Crippling Strike (Deadfire)|Crippling Strike]] |location = [[Vilario's Rest]] |quests = [[Helping Hands]] |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |body = Vailian Clothing |weapon1 = Crossbow (Deadfire){{!}}Crossbow |internalname = NPC_Crew_Irrena
CRW_Irrena |guid = c0d8cf7b-1c9e-488b-bd29-c68d049105ba }} '''Irrena''' is a character and recruitable [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire crew members|crew member]] in {{poe2}}. ==Background== A founding member of the Defiant's crew and one of the survivors of the Deadfire welcome. Although she survived, she didn't do so unscathed: She suffered a broken knee and a nasty gouge along the length of her shin. It's the result of her trying to fasten the mess on the deck when the ship hit ground. A barrel crunched her leg. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [[Helping Hands]] |none = |other = |crew = {{crewrank|1|deckhand}}
{{crewrank|1|cook}}
Personality: Fearless }} ===Quests=== * [[Helping Hands]]: Irrena can be saved during the course of the quest. ==Gallery== female_human_02_sm.png | Irrena's crew portrait [[Category:Vilario's Rest characters]]
title: Irrena
